justification: They note B can keep the preferred pocket QB and trade a surplus QB, but misread B’s win-now needs and consistency bias. Offering an ‘Out’ Tier 5 committee RB and a high-variance WR for a Tier 1 QB is misaligned with B’s priorities (workhorse RBs, reliable targets). Value is lopsided and calling it “RB stability” is inaccurate. Rationale is brief and generic, with little evidence or context.
